name: The Plague Test
description:
You wake up inside a spooky looking house, but you're not sure how you got there in the first place. You're instructed by a mysterious figure that you need to escape the house, but someone else is inside the house hunting you down. Will you be able to escape?

Another game dedicated to the second Luigikid creepypasta challenge, and probably no further development will be added to the game, other than bug fixes in the future.
